mapper.select: SELECT a.board_no , a.board_title , a.board_content , b.mem_id , b.mem_nm , a.create_date , a.update_date FROM board a ,member b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.del_yn ='N' ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
SELECT a.board_no , a.board_title , a.board_content , b.mem_id , b.mem_nm , a.create_date , a.update_date FROM board a ,member b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.board_no = #{boardNo}

SELECT a.board_no , a.board_title , a.board_content , b.mem_id , b.mem_nm , a.create_date , a.update_date FROM board a ,member b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.del_yn ='N'
AND a.board_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND a.board_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND b.mem_nm LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
SELECT a.reply_no , a.mem_id , b.mem_nm , a.reply_content , TO_CHAR(a.reply_date, 'MM/DD HH24:MI') as reply_date FROM replys a, member b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.reply_no = #{replyNo}

SELECT a.reply_no , a.mem_id , b.mem_nm , a.reply_content , TO_CHAR(a.reply_date, 'MM/dd HH24:MI') AS reply_date FROM replys a, member b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.board_no = #{boardNo} AND a.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY reply_date DESC
